name: The 6th Int'l Conference on Physical Chemistry
content: Due to COVID-19 epidemic situation all over the world, most countries still maintain a strict policy of no-gathering, no-entering and leaving the country, and 14-days quarantine. We have to postpone the conference till July 19-21, 2020 in Kunming, China. You are welcome to submit and attend the conference. The 6th Int'l Conference on Physical Chemistry (CPC 2020) Conference Date: July 19-21, 2020 Conference Venue: Kunming, China Website: http://www.marchconf.org/conference/CPC2020/ Online Registration System: http://www.marchconf.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1216 Email: paper\_service@163.com The 6th Int'l Conference on Physical Chemistry (CPC 2020) will be held from July 19-21, 2020 in Kunming, China. This Conference will cover issues on Physical Chemistry. The aim for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods. Invited Speakers Dr. Jinjin Li, Tsinghua University, China Prof. Xuhui Sun, Soochow University, China Prof. Jing Wei, Xi'an Jiaotong University, China Dr. Istvan Szilagyi, University of Szeged, Hungary Prof. M. G. Mostofa Khan, Tianjin University, China Prof. Jiang Yang, Xi'an Petroleum University, China Prof. Nicole Jaffrezic Renault, University of Lyon, France Prof. Jin Shen, Shandong University of Technology, China Prof. Victor Borovkov, South-Central University for Nationalities, China Dr. David Kreher, Institut Parisien de Chimie Moleculaire (IPCM), France Prof. Xusheng Shao, East China University of Science and Technology, China Prof. Jinwoo Lee, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), Republic of Korea Publication and Presentation Publication: Open Access Journal, please contact us for detailed information Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System.
